title: Paris16 George V Marceau 5 minutes Champs Elysées
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


75016 PARIS JUST MARCEAU GEORGE V  THIS FLAT IN A A VERY SECURED BUILDING DIGICODE INTERPHONE  a high level very sunny flat   a a very nice 2 rooms à very nice renovated flat with an American kitchen and all the machines washing plates washing clothes a nice bedroom with a wardrobe and a modern shower room

This flat can be rented for a long term rental if you can to work and you need a 
« logement de fonction « or if you need 
« a secondary flat ». This lovely flat can suit to you.

This flat is in a very good building with security digicode and a second door with interphone and lift , and it s situated 4th floor so you have a sunny and very clear flat  with a little balcony high level . 

2200 euros fees included without electricity, monthly price 
location meublée a l annee logement de fonction ou résidence secondaire.

Metro George V Iéna Boissiere ARC DE TRIOMPHE ÉTOILE RER A  to the airport Disney Land RER C To VERSAILLES
